content.original: The Laser Anti-Missile System (LAMS) is an advanced variation of the standard Anti-Missile Systems. While the standard system utilizes a machine gun linked to specialized tracking systems, the LAMS uses a Small Pulse Laser, ensuring that the system never runs out of ammunition.
content.prevOriginal: The Laser Anti-Missile System (LAMS) is an advanced variation of the standard Anti-Missile Systems. While the standard system utilizes a machine gun linked to specialized tracking systems, the LAMS uses a Small Pulse Laser, ensuring that the system never runs out of ammunition.
content.content: Лазерная противоракетная система (LAMS) является усовершенствованным вариантом стандартной ПРС. В то время как стандартная система использует пулемёт, связанный со специализированными системами слежения, LAMS использует небольшой импульсный лазер, гарантирующий, что в системе никогда не закончатся боеприпасы.

content.original: Being unable to efficiently extend the PDHS effects to the entire Engine Block have Luthien Engineers mananged to combine a Compact with PDHS Cooling, creating a less Bulky Cooling at cost of some weight. Treating the Engines Cooling System with this experimental system improves the general performance at risk of a Fatal Explosion. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: Being unable to efficiently extend the PDHS effects to the entire Engine Block have Luthien Engineers mananged to combine a Compact with PDHS Cooling, creating a less Bulky Cooling at cost of some weight. content.content: Не имея возможности эффективно использовать эффекты PDHS на весь двигательный блок, инженеры Luthien привнесли компактность в охлаждение PDHS, создав менее громоздкое охлаждение за счет увеличения веса. Использование системы охлаждения двигателя с помощью экспериментальной системы улучшает её производительность, но с риском фатального взрыва. ВЗРЫВООПАСНО!

content.original: Hardened Armor is a thicker armor type that uses multiple overlapping plates to provide additional protection against enemy fire. Though capable of diverting more damage than standard armor, the increased number of armor plates and their lack of flexibility makes any unit employing it more difficult to pilot, and can affect the speed as well. Activatable: DEALS DAMAGE AND CRIT TO CENTER TORSO ON FAILURE

Несмотря на то, что она отводит больше урона, чем стандартная броня, увеличенное количество пластин брони и отсутствие гибкости затрудняют управление юнитом, а также может повлиять на скорость. Activatable: НАНОСИТ УРОН И КРИТ ЦЕНТРАЛЬНОМУ ТОРСУ ПРИ СБОЕ

content.original: Developed by the Terran Hegemony in 2487, Endo Steel was designed especially for use in BattleMech skeletons. The Corean OM-77 Endo-Steel was an attempt to incorporate Clan Manufacturing Techniques in Inner Sphere Processes, slightly reducing its size at increased costs.

Corean эндосталь OM-77 была попыткой внедрить производственные технологии Кланов в технологии Внутренней Сферы, немного уменьшив их размер при увеличении затрат.

content.original: The Federated Suns introduced the Composite Internal Structure. Inspired by the Endo Steel chassis, the FedSuns engineers produced a chassis that was light weight but wasn't as bulky as the Endo Steel skeleton. Though they were successful, the materials used in the Composite Structure were incredibly fragile.

Вдохновленные шасси на эндостали, инженеры ФедСода создали шасси, которое было легким и не таким громоздким, как скелет из эндостали. Несмотря на успех, материалы, использованные в композитной структуре, были невероятно хрупкими.

content.original: Hardened Armor is a thicker armor type that uses multiple overlapping plates to provide additional protection against enemy fire. content.original:
All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Command Consoles are components that can only be mounted on Heavy or Assault Class 'Mechs. The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle. Most still existing have been relegated to training duties.
content.prevOriginal:
All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Command Consoles are components that can only be mounted on Heavy or Assault Class 'Mechs. The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle. Most still existing have been relegated to training duties.
content.content:
Все мехи оснащены стандартными конфигурациями кокпитов, которые могут быть усовершенствованы. Модификации кокпита улучшают пространство, занимаемое мехвоином во время сражения, предоставляя увеличенную защиту от смертельных ранений. Командные консоли могут быть установлены только на тяжелых и штурмовых мехах. Консоль содержит полный набор элементов управления для второго мехвоина с дополнительными средствами контроля, что позволяет улучшить координацию копья за счет повышения инициативы.

Командные консоли эпохи Звездной лиги редко встречаются в 3025 году, потому что экипированные ими мехи были приоритетными целями в бою. Большинство из сохранившихся было списано на учебные полигоны.

content.original: Scrambles enemy systems and grants morale to the lance
content.prevOriginal: Scrambles enemy systems and grants morale to the lance
content.content: Нарушает работу вражеских систем и повышает боевой дух копья

content.original: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.prevOriginal: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.content: Компьютеры наведения - это сложные электронные устройства, которые, в отличие от обычных систем наведения, физически помогают мехвоинам наводить оружие на противника. В то время, как компенсаторы отдачи и гироскопические стабилизаторы помогают предотвратить обычное смещения оружия от отдачи и движения, компьютер наведения учитывает атмосферные и другие условия, чтобы обеспечить аккуратное ведение цели. Это позволяет повысить точность стрельбы до хирургического уровня, особенно если не поскупиться на качественное железо.

content.original: Buffered Vehicular Direct Neural Interface was an improvement on standard VDNI developed for the Manei Domini. Introduced several years after the start of the Jihad, buffered VDNI was available only to those who held the rank of Omicron. While operating similarly to standard VDNI, the buffered model further enhanced the neurological fail-safes to create a safer, more potent system.

content.original: All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock targeting and tracking system—or TTS—which can be upgraded for improved performance. content.content: Все мехи оснащены стандартной системой прицеливания и слежения - или TTS, - которую можно модернизировать для улучшения характеристик. Модификации повышают точность при атаке баллистическим, энергетическим или ракетным оружием, в зависимости от типа TTS. Не складывается с одним и тем же типом, но складывается с другими.

content.original: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems. This system has been further improved to help the mechwarrior to aim more accurate in all ranges.
content.prevOriginal: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems. This system has been further improved to help the mechwarrior to aim more accurate in all ranges.
content.content: Компьютеры наведения - это сложные электронные устройства, которые, в отличие от обычных систем наведения, физически помогают мехвоинам наводить оружие на противника. В то время, как компенсаторы отдачи и гироскопические стабилизаторы помогают предотвратить обычное смещения оружия от отдачи и движения, компьютер наведения учитывает атмосферные и другие условия, чтобы обеспечить аккуратное ведение цели. Это позволяет повысить точность стрельбы до хирургического уровня, особенно если не поскупиться на качественное железо. Эта система была доработана, чтобы помочь мехвоину точнее целиться на всех дистанциях.

content.original:
All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Command Consoles are components that can only be mounted on Heavy or Assault Class 'Mechs. The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle. Most still existing have been relegated to training duties.
content.prevOriginal:
All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Command Consoles are components that can only be mounted on Heavy or Assault Class 'Mechs. The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle. Most still existing have been relegated to training duties.
content.content:
Все мехи оснащены стандартными конфигурациями кокпитов, которые могут быть усовершенствованы. Модификации кокпита улучшают пространство, занимаемое мехвоином во время сражения, предоставляя увеличенную защиту от смертельных ранений. Командные консоли могут быть установлены только на тяжелых и штурмовых мехах. Консоль содержит полный набор элементов управления для второго мехвоина с дополнительными средствами контроля, что позволяет улучшить координацию копья за счет повышения инициативы. 

Командные консоли эпохи Звездной лиги редко встречаются в 3025 году, потому что экипированные ими мехи были приоритетными целями в бою. Большинство из сохранившихся было списано на учебные полигоны.

content.original:
All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Command Consoles are components that can only be mounted on Heavy or Assault Class 'Mechs. The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle. Most still existing have been relegated to training duties.
content.prevOriginal:
All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Command Consoles are components that can only be mounted on Heavy or Assault Class 'Mechs. The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle. Most still existing have been relegated to training duties.
content.content:
Все мехи оснащены стандартными конфигурациями кокпитов, которые могут быть усовершенствованы. Модификации кокпита улучшают пространство, занимаемое мехвоином во время сражения, предоставляя увеличенную защиту от смертельных ранений. Командные консоли могут быть установлены только на тяжелых и штурмовых мехах. Консоль содержит полный набор элементов управления для второго мехвоина с дополнительными средствами контроля, что позволяет улучшить координацию копья за счет повышения инициативы. 

Командные консоли эпохи Звездной лиги редко встречаются в 3025 году, потому что экипированные ими мехи были приоритетными целями в бою. Большинство из сохранившихся было списано на учебные полигоны.

content.original: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.prevOriginal: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.content: Компьютеры наведения - это сложные электронные устройства, которые, в отличие от обычных систем наведения, физически помогают мехвоинам наводить оружие на противника. В то время, как компенсаторы отдачи и гироскопические стабилизаторы помогают предотвратить обычное смещения оружия от отдачи и движения, компьютер наведения учитывает атмосферные и другие условия, чтобы обеспечить аккуратное ведение цели. Это позволяет повысить точность стрельбы до хирургического уровня, особенно если не поскупиться на качественное железо.

content.original: The rogue scientists of the Society developed the Nova CEWS after hearing about the C3 Systems used by the Inner Sphere. By combining elements of the Watchdog CEWS with a C3 system, they created a tool that could find enemy forces, hide the unit using it in an ECM bubble, and automatically provide targeting data to other friendly units. In addition, the Nova CEWS didn't require pre-configuration for the C3 capability; It could be programmed on the fly to respond to availability of friendly forces.

content.original: The Guardian ECM Suite was introduced in 2597 by Johnston Industries of the Terran Hegemony. Designed to interfere with guided weaponry, targeting computers, and communication systems, the Guardian was typically used to shield allied units from such equipment by emitting a broad-band signal meant to confuse radar, infrared, ultraviolet, magscan and sonar sensors.
content.prevOriginal: The Guardian ECM Suite was introduced in 2597 by Johnston Industries of the Terran Hegemony. Designed to interfere with guided weaponry, targeting computers, and communication systems, the Guardian was typically used to shield allied units from such equipment by emitting a broad-band signal meant to confuse radar, infrared, ultraviolet, magscan and sonar sensors.
content.content: Комплекс РЭБ Guardian был представлен в 2597 году компанией Johnston Industries из Терранской гегемонии. Разработанный для создания помех оружию, которое использует компьютерное наведение, а также для создания проблем системам связи, Guardian обычно использовался для защиты союзных юнитов от других устройств РЭБ путём излучения широкополосного сигнала, призванного сбить с толку радары, инфракрасные, ультрафиолетовые, магнитные и сонарные сенсоры.

content.original: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.prevOriginal: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.content: Компьютеры наведения - это сложные электронные устройства, которые, в отличие от обычных систем наведения, физически помогают мехвоинам наводить оружие на противника. В то время, как компенсаторы отдачи и гироскопические стабилизаторы помогают предотвратить обычное смещения оружия от отдачи и движения, компьютер наведения учитывает атмосферные и другие условия, чтобы обеспечить аккуратное ведение цели. Это позволяет повысить точность стрельбы до хирургического уровня, особенно если не поскупиться на качественное железо.

content.original: Not quite as potent as the air-to-air Arrow missiles introduced by the Lyrans and the Wolves, this much smaller air-to-air missile version had its debut with the allied aerospace forces of the Duchy of Tamarind and Duchess Alys Rousset-Marik’s resistance movement. Built smaller and leaner, these so-called light air-to-air (LAA) missiles can be carried by smaller ﬁghters and create far less drag during atmospheric operations. With a little creativity a decent mechtech crew can bolt these onto a mech as an air defense measure.
content.prevOriginal: Not quite as potent as the air-to-air Arrow missiles introduced by the Lyrans and the Wolves, this much smaller air-to-air missile version had its debut with the allied aerospace forces of the Duchy of Tamarind and Duchess Alys Rousset-Marik’s resistance movement. Built smaller and leaner, these so-called light air-to-air (LAA) missiles can be carried by smaller ﬁghters and create far less drag during atmospheric operations. With a little creativity a decent mechtech crew can bolt these onto a mech as an air defense measure.
content.content: Не столь мощная, как ракеты Arrow «воздух-воздух», представленные лиранцами и Волками, эта гораздо более компактная версия ракеты «воздух-воздух» дебютировала в составе союзных воздушно-космических сил герцогства Тамаринд и движения сопротивления герцогини Алис Руссо-Марик. Эти так называемые лёгкие ракеты класса «воздух-воздух» (LAA), имеющие меньшие размеры и меньшее сопротивление при работе в атмосфере, могут переноситься малой техникой. При должной смекалке команда техов может прикрутить их и к меху в качестве средства ПВО.

content.original: Inferno-IV Missiles are a variation of Arrow IV missiles first introduced by the Capellan Confederation. The technology was based on recovered Clan FASCAM missiles and was designed to deploy the newly-invented Inferno Mines. Unfortunately, the mines proved to be unstable and would instead ignite upon impact, causing widespread fires. 10 rounds.

content.original: This was an Advanced Tactical Missile system, before someone turned it into this wreckage. This is the famous case of getting a weapon into some nutcases hand but no ammo for it. The whole system has been turned upside down, the Artemis got completely yanked out and they put a jury rigged RAC-feeder in its place, allowing the speed at which it launches Missiles to be adjusted, but i'd be carefull setting it to high speed, though slower speeds improve its lock on speed. VOLATILE! Uses LRM/MRM/SRM Ammo. Firing Modes: LRM, MRM, SRM

content.original: The SodaPopAC-TAC-UltraLightAutoRevolver is another salvage miracle from Cyrus Miles. This chopped RAC2 was modified to fire rounds formed from SodaPop cans, hardened to form a penetrating shell, and filled with a sticky liquid that's guaranteed to short-circuit and gum-up any internals it hits. Weight savings came at the expense of combat reloads and any range whatsoever. Still not sure what Through Armor Criticals mean though, only thing I got from Cyrus was '4th Wall'. 1 SHOT!

content.original: The Fluid Gun is nothing more than a militarized Fluid Sprayer system. By toughening the feed lines and storage tanks, the engineers of Solaris VII created a system roughly equivalent to a Flamer. Unlike the flamer however, the Fluid Gun can store and spray a variety of fluid types. Clever arena fighters have used water, oil slicks, Inferno Fuel, Cooling Fluid, and Corrosive Fluids in matches. Uses Fluid Cannisters (Ammo).

content.original: The Grazer is one of many dead end attempts at producing a next generation directed energy weapon. Particles in the Gamma Ray range are not as easily stopped by solid matter as conventional light resulting in improved armor penetration, but only on par with a heavy autocannon. Mounted on the, also experimental, Urbanlord, it proved effective in fighting to Free Tiaw...St. Ives. However the system was ultimately judged too difficult to manufacture on a large scale, and some mechwarriors reported finding it's multiple firing modes distracting and difficult to manage in the heat of battle.

content.prevOriginal: The LRM10 rack of Long-Range Missiles occupies a supporting fire role when mounted on most units, with fairly low damage balanced by low heat and ammunition consumption. Like all LRMs, LRM10s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain. LRM can fill a variety of roles using specialized ammunition. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to toggle Hot-Loading. (HL) missiles have no minimum range but can Misfire, damaging the launcher.

This version however was changed to house 4 salvo of rockets instead of the usual just 1. 4 SHOT! VOLATILE!

content.original: The Medium-Range Missile Launcher was designed by scientists at Luthien Armor Works. MRMs are dead-fire missiles that are fired more like lasers than missiles. In order to pack as many missiles as possible into one salvo, scientists removed guidance systems and made the whole package smaller. Though this was seen as a step backwards in technological development, the inexpensive and deadly MRMs have spread throughout the Draconis Combine and to many mercenary units. Uses MRM Ammo. 5 Salvos VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: The Medium-Range Missile Launcher was designed by scientists at Luthien Armor Works. MRMs are dead-fire missiles that are fired more like lasers than missiles. In order to pack as many missiles as possible into one salvo, scientists removed guidance systems and made the whole package smaller. Though this was seen as a step backwards in technological development, the inexpensive and deadly MRMs have spread throughout the Draconis Combine and to many mercenary units. Uses MRM Ammo. 5 Salvos VOLATILE!
content.content: Ракетная установка средней дальности была разработана учеными из Luthien Armor Works. Для того, чтобы вместить как можно больше ракет в один залп, ученые удалили из ракет внутренние системы наведения и сделали корпус меньше. Хотя это считалось шагом назад в технологическом плане, недорогие и смертоносные MRM распространились по всему Синдикату Дракона и среди многих наемников. Uses MRM Ammo. 5 Salvos ВЗРЫВООПАСНО!

content.original: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.prevOriginal: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.content: Компьютеры наведения - это сложные электронные устройства, которые, в отличие от обычных систем наведения, физически помогают мехвоинам нацеливаться на своих противников. Компенсаторы отдачи и гироскопические стабилизаторы используются для предотвращения смещения оружия от отдачи и передвижения, в то время как компьютер учитывает атмосферные и другие условия, чтобы обеспечить точное упреждение цели. Это позволяет добиться хирургической точности стрельбы, особенно с дорогими и точными системами.

content.original: As part of the experiments that led to Triple Strength Myomer, the NAIS and other research firms went through several prototypes. Though unsuited for combat use, there were several formulations that held promise for Industrial applications. This information, allowed IndustrialMech manufacturers to create Industrial Triple Strength Myomer which was ideally suited for loading, hauling, and other heavy lift tasks.
content.prevOriginal: As part of the experiments that led to Triple Strength Myomer, the NAIS and other research firms went through several prototypes. Though unsuited for combat use, there were several formulations that held promise for Industrial applications. This information, allowed IndustrialMech manufacturers to create Industrial Triple Strength Myomer which was ideally suited for loading, hauling, and other heavy lift tasks.
content.content: В рамках экспериментов, которые привели к созданию миомеров тройной силы, ИННА и другие исследовательские фирмы испытали несколько прототипов. Хотя они не подходили для боевого использования, было несколько образцов, которые были перспективны для промышленного применения. Они позволили производителям промышленных мехов создать промышленный миомер тройной силы, который идеально подходил для погрузки, транспортировки и других задач с тяжёлыми грузами.

content.original: Boss, listen up. The GMC Vandura got this fancy gizmo in it that's gonna keep it from ramming other 'mechs and vehicles. This computer doohickey's always watching out, keeping an eye on what's ahead. If it sees you're about to hit something, it'll warn you and even tap the brakes if it has to. This thing's smarter than a hound dog on a scent trail, making sure the Vandura stays in one piece and outta trouble. I pity the fool who tries to remove this!
